title: Taxi Racer 1 by Stellar Stone (2001 PC)
description:
Game title: Taxi Racer 1 also known as 'Taxi: Without the Brakes.'

Developer: Stellar Stone LLC

Publisher: Best Buys Interactive

Platform: PC

Release date: Q1 2001

Genre: Driving/Racing
 
Theme: Motorsports 

Rating: 5/5




Overview:

City is waiting for you! As fearless city taxi driver, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll drive thru city filled with impatient clients who wanted to be driven to their destinations!

Gameplay:
Taxi Racer pits you against your worst enemy, Traffic, in a battle for cold-hard cash. You must quickly navigate the mean streets and meaner traffic in an attempt to pick up and deliver as many patrons as possible in the time limit. Each passenger you pick up will have a cash fare value assigned to them, this fare is related to the distance the passenger wants to travel. In order to get your dolla dolla bill y'all you must use you talents as a supreme taxi-racer to rule the world of competitive transport, if you don't get paid then you can't get laid. Taxi Racer reinforces the truth that cash rules everything around you, so you must remember to race hard and get paid.

System Requirements:

Be aware that to run game your PC should meet following minimal system requirements:

Intel Pentium II 233 processor
32MB System RAM
100MB Free Hard Disk space
AGP 3D accelerator card with at least 16MB Video RAM
Mouse
Sound Card
Windows 98 or Windows 2000
Microsoft DirectX version 8 installed.


Box art annotations:

"Braking is for losers!

You earn your living driving a taxi in the city. One day you wake up and you are fed-up with all the losers that stay in the middle lane and everybody else that gets in your way. You decide to take your car to the max, and see how much money you can really earn if you ignore all the rules and regulations, just put your foot down without thinking about your passengers.

Start your working day, trying to earn as much money as you can. Remember ... rules are not for you, speed and money are the only thing that count! Choose from various missions such as the 90 second Countdown or a full days work.

Taxi Racer is the ideal way to get rid of your aggression towards all the losers on the road!"
